</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#resolverqueryloggingconfigsharestatus">Resolver<wbr>Query<wbr>Logging<wbr>Config<wbr>Share<wbr>Status</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}ShareStatus, possible values are NOT_SHARED, SHARED_WITH_ME, SHARED_BY_ME.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}ResolverQueryLogConfigStatus, possible values are CREATING, CREATED, DELETED AND FAILED.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
